file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Introduction sequence for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony' CREATORS' STAGE, showcasing participating members and creators.
Group performance of the song 'Prism' by hololive members on the CREATORS' STAGE.

subtitles.original: hololive 6th fes. DAY2
subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. DAY2

subtitles.original: CREATORS' STAGE
subtitles.english: CREATORS' STAGE

subtitles.original: hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE
subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pallet, pallet, pallet, we will shine!

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With our calling voices as the signal

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Pallet, pallet, pallet, we're going to search

subtitles.original: スタートは何度だって
subtitles.english: Any moment can be a start

subtitles.original: 独り言 綴った
subtitles.english: I wrote down my soliloquies

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I ran, simply wanting to begin

subtitles.original: 遠く 暗がりと思った
subtitles.english: I thought it was a distant darkness

subtitles.original: それは 眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: But it was a name that shone too brightly

subtitles.original: それは 優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those are memories that are too kind

subtitles.original: もっと 近づけて手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out to get closer

subtitles.original: 想いだけで結び合った
subtitles.english: We were bound together by feelings alone

subtitles.original: ほら 今 虹のつま先になった
subtitles.english: Look, now we've become the tips of the rainbow

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pallet, pallet, pallet, we will shine!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも 愛しさも 全て連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your regrets, your love, and everything else with you

subtitles.original: 架せる夢 羽 飛び立たせるさ
subtitles.english: We'll make our dreams and wings take flight

subtitles.original: 細やかな祈りは光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: Our tiny prayers are light, an endless sign

subtitles.original: 君を 見つけたこと
subtitles.english: Finding you...

subtitles.original: 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: ...is something I can be proud of

subtitles.original: ここから これから あまねく
subtitles.english: From here, from now, everywhere...

subtitles.original: パレパレ
subtitles.english: Pallet, pallet!
